threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: @progress_unity: High energy prices hurt us all, but the solution isn't isolation. We need renewable energy investments & international cooperation, not endless wars. Prioritize the planet and the people, not just profits and power. 🌍✊

persona.name: Progressive
persona.persona: Prioritize social justice, equality, and inclusivity in decision-making. Advocate for progressive policies that address systemic issues. Support government intervention to address social and economic disparities. Emphasize environmental sustainability and global cooperation.
persona.summary: I am a progressive and centered person.
